prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: AI-Native Applications focus on human-understandable concepts such as personas, knowledge, and actions, rather than traditional programming elements like if statements, loops, variables, or tokens. This paradigm shift aims to make application development more intuitive and user-centric.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
